author: alefisico
body:
#### PR description:

Fix softdrop mass for fatjets in nanoAOD. Currently the msoftdrop variable is calculated out of the corrected softdrop subjets, which is not useful for W-tagging. 

#### PR validation:

The output of `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` is here: https://cernbox.cern.ch/index.php/s/uUNqyH7vVSzHMk6

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport but we will need one.
title: Fixing softdrop mass in nanoAOD
